name: Invertible.ne_zero
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝² : MulZeroOneClass α
a : α
inst✝¹ : Nontrivial α
inst✝ : Invertible a
⊢ Ne a 0
decl:
theorem Invertible.ne_zero [MulZeroOneClass α] (a : α) [Nontrivial α] [Invertible a] : a ≠ 0 :=
  fun ha =>
  zero_ne_one <|
    calc
      0 = ⅟ a * a := by simp [ha]
      _ = 1 := invOf_mul_self

initialProofState:

name: Invertible.toNeZero
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝² : MulZeroOneClass α
inst✝¹ : Nontrivial α
a : α
inst✝ : Invertible a
⊢ NeZero a
decl:
instance (priority := 100) Invertible.toNeZero [MulZeroOneClass α] [Nontrivial α] (a : α)
    [Invertible a] : NeZero a :=
  ⟨Invertible.ne_zero a⟩

name: Ring.inverse_invertible
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝¹ : MonoidWithZero α
x : α
inst✝ : Invertible x
⊢ Eq (Ring.inverse x) (Invertible.invOf x)
decl:
/-- A variant of `Ring.inverse_unit`. -/
@[simp]
theorem Ring.inverse_invertible (x : α) [Invertible x] : Ring.inverse x = ⅟ x :=
  Ring.inverse_unit (unitOfInvertible _)

name: invOf_eq_inv
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝¹ : GroupWithZero α
a : α
inst✝ : Invertible a
⊢ Eq (Invertible.invOf a) (Inv.inv a)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem invOf_eq_inv (a : α) [Invertible a] : ⅟ a = a⁻¹ :=
  invOf_eq_right_inv (mul_inv_cancel₀ (Invertible.ne_zero a))

name: invOf_div
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝³ : GroupWithZero α
a b : α
inst✝² : Invertible a
inst✝¹ : Invertible b
inst✝ : Invertible (HDiv.hDiv a b)
⊢ Eq (Invertible.invOf (HDiv.hDiv a b)) (HDiv.hDiv b a)
decl:
theorem invOf_div (a b : α) [Invertible a] [Invertible b] [Invertible (a / b)] :
    ⅟ (a / b) = b / a :=
  invOf_eq_right_inv (by simp [← mul_div_assoc])
